member.summary: Attempt to transform a point based on the effect.

member.summary: The effect instance.

member.summary: If the transform is an inverse.

member.summary: The transform specific to this Effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Expression.Media.Effects.MagnifyEffect.MagnifyGeneralTransform.#ctor(Microsoft.Expression.Media.Effects.MagnifyEffect)
member.summary: Creates a new instance.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Expression.Media.Effects.MagnifyEffect.MagnifyGeneralTransform.TransformBounds(System.Windows.Rect)
member.summary: This particular effect keeps axis-aligned lines axis-aligned, so the transformation of the Rect is just transformation of its corner points.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Expression.Media.Effects.MagnifyEffect.MagnifyGeneralTransform.OutToIn(System.Windows.Point,System.Double,System.Double,System.Windows.Point,System.Double)
member.summary:
For the inverse of the shader, we need to find Pin which is the Pixel Ouput, given Pout the texture input (is the reverse of the shader) However, the shader algorithm is dependant on the radius of the pixel output from the center, which is a variable that we don't have when computing the inverse. We need to perform bisection in order to converge using the equation below PHatout = PHat_in*Scalar where PHatout = Pout - Pcenter pHatin = Pin -Pcenter
Scalar is dependent on the radius of Pin (which we don't have).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Expression.Media.Effects.MagnifyEffect.MagnifyGeneralTransform.InToOut(System.Windows.Point,System.Double,System.Double,System.Windows.Point,System.Double)
member.summary: Given a pixel output (Pin) find the texture input (Pout).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Expression.Media.Effects.MagnifyEffect.MagnifyGeneralTransform.PointIsInCircle(System.Windows.Point,System.Windows.Point,System.Double)
member.summary: Determines if a point is within an ellipse.
member.param: The center point of the ellipse.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Expression.Media.Effects.MagnifyEffect.MagnifyGeneralTransform.Inverse
member.summary: Gets the inverse transform.

member.summary: Attempt to transform inPoint with the Swirl effect.

member.returns: Returns true but throws if false.
